name: WitchBrew (logicprojects, DeanManring)
description:
Controls:

WASD to move, Space to dodge roll, Click to swing dagger in direction of mouse.

After collecting enemy drops you can click on them (in your inventory) to combine them into a potion effect.  2 drops from the same species will permanently increase your speed, 2 drops from different enemies will heal you 1 heart.

There is a legend of a giant turtle in the far north east reaches of the map.

Source: https://github.com/mwbryant/bevy_jam_potion_rougelike
